noget, vi tager alvorligt hos Orkla. Derfor

CT Mobile - full featured work
offline, productivity tools,
digital selling aid

Scroll Down

ALL IN ONE SOLUTION

CT Mobile allows full-featured work offline and synchronizes the
changes with the cloud when internet connection becomes
available. With additional benefits as built in productivity tools and
Digital Selling Aid it increases productivity and sales.

Our clients

INDUSTRIES

Pharma

Manage HCPs and pharmacies, market cycles, sample drops, train and educate sales reps using best practices and remote joint visits.

Medical Devices

Manage customers, orders, sales and post-sale activities, integrate sales and services, increase revenue through the service channel.

Insurance

Manage customers, prospects and policies, create customized quote with comparison to competitors, generate the contract, obtain digital signature and get payment on the contract on the spot

Real Estate

Manage customers, agents, brokers and listings, close deals faster and easier

CPG & Retail

Manage products, catalogs, orders, invoices, stock and deliveries, shelf audit and optimization, point of sale visit planning and optimization.

Key Features

Your mobile digital
selling aid

All the data in Salesforce CRM, at your fingertips.

L'eau et l'homme, le
meilleur de la nature
proche de vous

Nous nous engageons à vous offrir tout au long de votre vie,
des réponses naturelles, sans cesse meilleures, à vos
besoins d'hydratation et vos envies de rafraichissement.

Products
Swipe

Key
Features:

  • 6 brands
  • 850 million liters
  • 1,2 К employees
  • 6 production
    sites

Natural mineral water only comes
from underground springs

Any chemical treatment is
prohibited

The spring is protected against
every pollution risk

Types of Water

Structure
Du Groupe:

DEVIN is the leading bottled water company in Bulgaria. All sources and the bottling facility are based in the ecologically clean and pure region of Devin, in the heart of the Rhodopi mountains. DEVIN is also the distribution partner for Red Bull and Granini in Bulgaria.

The company is operating a national sales & distribution network, headquartered in Sofia. At present, DEVIN has over 500 employees. The Chief Executive Officer of the company is Mr. Thomas Krennbauer.

History

records.Name: home
records.clm__Code__c:
vidéo sur l'entreprise
L'Eau, Notre Passion Amélioration de la Qualité de Votre Eau Tout Vos Besoins Calcaure dans l'Eau Des Éléments Chimique dans Votre Eau Une Solution Compléte

L’EAU, NOTRE
PASSION

Nos systèmes de traitement d’eau pour la maison
améliorent tout ce que vous faites avec votre eau : la
lessive, la cuisine, la douche… et toutes les activités
quotidiennes de la vie.

Tout d’abord, Madame, Monsieur, j’aimerais vous présenter
Culligan.

Créé en 1936, Culligan est aujourd’hui présent dans plus de
80 pays, au travers de 1400 boutiques de l’eau.

En ce qui concerne la France, Culligan est la première
filiale du groupe avec 1200 collaborateurs et plus d’1
million de clients.

Implanté sur le territoire national depuis 1960,
Culligan est reconnu et représenté grâce au
professionnalisme de ses concessionnaires exclusifs.

Culligan a fait le choix d’une politique de service de
proximité ainsi, sur le plan local, notre concession se
trouve à :

12B Avenue de Paris,
02400 Château-Thierry

Culligan l`expert mondial du
traitement de l`eau

  • Présent dans 86 pays

  • Plus de 70 points de
    vente en France

  • Des professionnels
    prés de chez vous

Ils font confiance
á Culligan

Mills siden 1951

Vi i Mills er matentusiaster som hver eneste dag legger all vår lidenskap og...

Melange

Melange har vært det mest kjøpte merket i kategorien smør og margarin i flere...

Delikat

Delikat eventyret startet i Skomakergaten i Drammen for over 80 år siden, i 1931.

Soft Flora

Soft Flora er laget av rapsolje som gir mild og god smak, og smøremykhet.

Vita hjertego'

Stryhn's

Nå lanseres Stryhn's leverposteier i Norge. Produktene som lanseres er basert...

Olivero

Olivero passer for deg som vil ha den gode smørsmaken kombinert...

Lohmanders

Mange gode historier begynner med en god middag. Også historien om Lohmanders.

Mills tar allergi
på alvor

Mills AS ønsker å gjøre det enkelt å finne riktig
informasjon om innhold om allergener i våre
produkter. Bruk våre forhåndsvalgte kategorier for
å se hvilke av Mills sine produkter du kan spise.

  • Gluten
  • Melk
  • Egg
  • Skalldyr
  • Nøtter
  • Fisk

Mills + deg = sant?

Matglede siden 1885

Har du noen gang lurt på hvor lenge den folkekjære majonesen fra Mills har eksistert? Eller hvor den første produksjonen av Melange ble gjort?

Les mer

• Home
  • Electric Taxiing
  • Economy Calculator
  • Introduction

Safran Landing
Systems

Safran and Airbus are currently working on their electric
taxiing program for the Airbus A320 family. The aim? To
have the first aircraft upgraded and in service by
2021-2022.

More About SAFRAN

Company capabilities encompass the full life cycle of our products, ranging from design and manufacture to in-service support, repair and overhaul. Safran Landing Systems is a partner to 30 leading commercial, military,

business and regional airframers, and supports more than 27,000 aircraft making over 60,000 landings every day. The company employs more than 7,600 staff working in locations across Europe, North America and Asia.

Programs

Safran and Airbus are currently working on their electric
taxiing program for the Airbus A320 family. The aim? To
have the first aircraft upgraded and in service by
2021-2022.

  • Landing Gear Systems
  • Carbon Brakes
  • Global Solutions

Quality

Safran Landing Systems holds statutory approvals for all
its activities and its production sites.

Flight Safety Polic Read More About... Quality Policy Read More About...
